title: Average spend of eating out for lunch in the U.S. 2015

gold: The statistic shows the average cost of eating out for lunch in the United States in 2015.
The average cost of eating out for lunch in the U.S. was 11.14 U.S. dollars in 2015.
Eating out for lunch two times per week costs an average of 1,043 U.S. dollars per year .
